Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.item.Item
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.item.Weapon
public class Weapon extends Item
Represents a weapon item that can be used by the hero to deal damage. Weapons have damage, energy cost, and mana cost attributes.
Author:
Yacine

      public Weapon(String name, int damage, int energyCost, int manaCost, Shape shape, Rarity rarity, int price)
      Creates a new Weapon item.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the weapon
      damage - the damage dealt by the weapon
      energyCost - the energy cost to use the weapon
      manaCost - the mana cost to use the weapon
      shape - the shape of the weapon
      rarity - the rarity of the weapon
      price - the price of the weapon
